languages.text:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.
After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

traits.locale_text:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 free use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} until the end of their turn.
After using the free {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

Once per turn, after the wearer uses Blood Oath or Oath of Vengeance, they gain +1 free use of Dash until the end of their turn. After using the free Dash ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

Once per turn, after the wearer uses Blood Oath or Oath of Vengeance, they gain +1 free use of Dash until the end of their turn. After using the free Dash ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

languages.text:
Una vez por turno, cuando el portador usa {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Juramento de sangre{/g} o {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Juramento de venganza{/g}, gana +1 uso de {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera{/g} con un coste de 0 PA hasta el final de su turno.
Tras usar esta capacidad de {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}carrera{/g}, el portador recupera tantos PM como su firmeza.

After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

traits.locale_text:
Una vez por turno, cuando el portador usa {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Juramento de sangre{/g} o {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Juramento de venganza{/g}, gana +1 uso de {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera{/g} con un coste de 0 PA hasta el final de su turno.
Tras usar esta capacidad de {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}carrera{/g}, el portador recupera tantos PM como su firmeza.

languages.text:
着用者が{g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}ヴェンジェンス{/g}または{g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}復讐の誓い{/g}を使用した後、1ターンに1回、ターン終了まで、コスト0APの{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}の使用回数+1を得る。
{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}アビリティ使用後、着用者は決断力と同量のMPを回復する。
languages.original_text:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.
After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

traits.locale_text:
着用者が{g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}ヴェンジェンス{/g}または{g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}復讐の誓い{/g}を使用した後、1ターンに1回、ターン終了まで、コスト0APの{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}の使用回数+1を得る。
{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}アビリティ使用後、着用者は決断力と同量のMPを回復する。

languages.text:
每回合一次，当装备者使用{g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}鲜血誓言{/g}或{g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}复仇誓言{/g}后，可以额外使用1次{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}能力。此能力不消耗行动点数，回合结束后消失。
装备者使用{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}能力之后会获得额外的移动点数，等同于装备者的决心。
languages.original_text:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.
After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

traits.locale_text:
每回合一次，当装备者使用{g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}鲜血誓言{/g}或{g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}复仇誓言{/g}后，可以额外使用1次{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}能力。此能力不消耗行动点数，回合结束后消失。
装备者使用{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}能力之后会获得额外的移动点数，等同于装备者的决心。

languages.text:
Une fois par tour, après avoir utilisé {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Serment de sang{/g} ou {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Serment de vengeance{/g}, le porteur gagne +1 utilisation gratuite de {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
Après avoir utilisé cette capacité, le porteur regagne des PD à hauteur de sa Détermination.{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}{/g}
languages.original_text:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.
After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

traits.locale_text:
Une fois par tour, après avoir utilisé {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Serment de sang{/g} ou {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Serment de vengeance{/g}, le porteur gagne +1 utilisation gratuite de {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
Après avoir utilisé cette capacité, le porteur regagne des PD à hauteur de sa Détermination.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält nach dem Einsatz von {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blutschwur{/g} oder {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Eid der Rache{/g} einmal pro Zug bis zum Ende seines Zuges +1 Einsatz von {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} für 0 AP.
Nach dem Einsatz seiner {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g}-Fähigkeit erhält der Träger BP in Höhe seiner Entschlossenheit.
languages.original_text:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.
After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält nach dem Einsatz von {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blutschwur{/g} oder {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Eid der Rache{/g} einmal pro Zug bis zum Ende seines Zuges +1 Einsatz von {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} für 0 AP.
Nach dem Einsatz seiner {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g}-Fähigkeit erhält der Träger BP in Höhe seiner Entschlossenheit.

languages.text:
Один раз за ход после использования {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Кровавого обета{/g} или {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Клятвы отмщения{/g} персонаж получает 1 применение {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g}, не требующее затрат ОД, до конца хода.
После использования этой {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g} он восстанавливает число ОП, равное своей решимости.

After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

После использования этой {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g} он восстанавливает число ОП, равное своей решимости.

Один раз за ход после использования {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Кровавого обета{/g} или {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Клятвы отмщения{/g} персонаж получает 1 применение {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g}, не требующее затрат ОД, до конца хода.
После использования этой {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g} он восстанавливает число ОП, равное своей решимости.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi; her turda bir kez, {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Kan Yemini{/g} veya {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}İntikam Yemini{/g} kullandıktan sonra 0 EP bedelli bir {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} kullanım hakkı kazanır. Bu hakkı, o turun sonuna dek kullanabilir.
Giyen kişi, bu {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} kabiliyetini kullandıktan sonra kararlılık değeri kadar HP'sini geri kazanır.

After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.
